import React,{ useParams } from 'react' import Rating from '../../components/rating/Rating' import { products } from '../../data/products' function SingleProductPage() { const {param} = useParams() const product = products.find(prod => prod.id === +param) // parseInt(param) === +(param) return (

{product?.title}

${product?.price}
Quantity
{/* */}
) } export default SingleProductPage
